titleStmt.title: The gallant history of the life and death of that most noble knight, Sir Bevis of Southampton Wherein is contained much variety of pleasant and delightful reading.
Beuve de Hanstone.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A.M. for J. Deacon at the Angel in Guilt-spur-street without Newgate,

notesStmt.note: Imprint place and date suggested by Wing.
Varies from Wing G170 at 1830:7b which has pagination and has advertisements at C4v instead of woodcuts.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: the Angel in Guilt-spur-street without Newgate
